Sentencas: Dense protective layers are needed to reduce chromium-related degradation in SOFC stacks.
Titulo: Microstructure and phase evolution of atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn-Co-Fe oxide protection layers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In particular, atmospheric plasma sprayed (APS) Mn1.0Co1.0Fe0.1O4 (MCF) coatings demonstrated low degradation rates in stack tests.
Titulo: Microstructure and phase evolution of atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn-Co-Fe oxide protection layers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: We show that short-term annealing in air induces crack healing within these coatings.
Titulo: Microstructure and phase evolution of atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn-Co-Fe oxide protection layers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Parallel to this effect, a phase transformation is observed originating from oxidation that proceeds by solid state-diffusion.
Titulo: Microstructure and phase evolution of atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn-Co-Fe oxide protection layers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The present contribution reveals the basic mechanisms of the microstructural and phase changes of coatings in long-term annealing tests of up to 10,000 h at 700 degrees C.
Titulo: Microstructure and phase evolution of atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn-Co-Fe oxide protection layers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The layer develops differently at the air-facing surface and in the bulk.
Titulo: Microstructure and phase evolution of atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn-Co-Fe oxide protection layers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Due to cation deficiency, oxidation is dominated by cation outward diffusion, leading to a Co-enriched surface layer.
Titulo: Microstructure and phase evolution of atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn-Co-Fe oxide protection layers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The bulk displays a fine distribution of the initial (rock salt) and the final (spinel) phases.
Titulo: Microstructure and phase evolution of atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn-Co-Fe oxide protection layers for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Understanding the mechanisms leading to these irreversible changes enables predictions to be made concerning durable protectivecoatings in SOFCs.
Titulo: Microstructure and phase evolution of atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn-Co-Fe oxide protection layers for solid oxide fuel cells
